scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MONGO_USER=username MONGO_PASSWORD=password MONGO_DEFAULT_DATABASE=restapimess ITEMS_PER_PAGE=2 node app.js
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MONGO_USER=username MONGO_PASSWORD=password MONGO_DEFAULT_DATABASE=restapimess ITEMS_PER_PAGE=2 nodemon app.js
